text: Ayur Rekha is a 2007 Indian Malayalam film, directed by GM Manu, starring Mukesh and Indrajith in the lead roles.http://www.nowrunning.com/movie/4280/malayalam/ayur-rekha/index.htm Retrieved 2014-11-03. ==Cast== *Lakshmi Sharma as Dr. Aparna Menon *Mukesh as Thriprayar Madhavan *Jagathy Sreekumar as Thankappan Pilla *Sreenivasan as S.P. S.K. Jecob George/Chakkochen *Niyaz Musaliyar as S.I. Balachadran *Salim Kumar as P.C. Ismail *TP Madhavan as Dr. Thomas George *Urvasi as Alice Jacob *Saikumar as Dr. Venugopal *Jyothirmayi as Dr. Mallika Anad *Master Mithun as Arun Menon *Devi Chandana as Girija *Indrajith as Adv. Anad *Jagannadha Varma as Adv. G.K. Nambiyar *Nedumudi Venu as Captain Nair *Pradeep *Kochu Preman *Master Ganapathi *Master Vaisakh *Dr Vivin Mathew ==Soundtrack== Music: Sabish George, Lyrics: O. N. V. Kurup * "Indumukhi" - Vineeth Sreenivasan * "Neelmizhikalo" (D) - M. G. Sreekumar, Ranjini Jose * "Neelmizhikalo" (F) - Ranjini Jose * "Sree Ranjini" - M. G. Sreekumar ==References== ==External links== * Category:2007 films Category:Indian films Category:2000s Malayalam- language films
title: Ayur Rekha
